column4: Yesterday after netbook remix tried to update it messed things up and I've had problems since

for some reason I'm unable to log into any Google account from my browser, when I hit the shut down button the menu bar disappears but the netbook does not shut down.  And the sun java packages had been broken
maybe we should try one thing at a time
you might even want to apt-get -f remove firefox, and then reinstall after
